title: The possible references of Star Guardian MF
body:
https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-TijWbyn2hOw/WYqIOCSOwhI/AAAAAAAArJE/oe-mF-xb9tQQmWTZcAIQReuvTS47fI0fQCLcBGAs/s1600/mf.png
https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-NDDygIIheCA/WYoCfldDzoI/AAAAAAAAq-k/UYcric1m1gIS8DnDgV71MvFYnUd0CiJfQCLcBGAs/s1600/DGufDuOVwAAiKTW.jpg

Anarchy Panty ( she's a magical girl )
https://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/vsbattles/images/1/1a/Panty_anarchy_render.png/revision/latest?cb=20151229082152 ( same spiky bangs )
https://rhapsodistreviews.files.wordpress.com/2011/12/panty-image.jpg
http://pa1.narvii.com/6054/6aa081502afa19f6f37d8577a983222a70988ef8_hq.gif
https://ghostlightning.files.wordpress.com/2011/01/horriblesubs-panty-and-stocking-with-garterbelt-06-720p-mkv_snapshot_15-42_2011-01-12_15-05-37.jpg

And Jeffree Star ( the face is really similiar )
http://ugc.reveliststatic.com/gen/constrain/800/800/80/2017/02/27/13/64/g3/ph1em90lgk2qbwe.jpg ( same peach-orange colored hair )
http://coolspotters.com/files/photos/301526/jeffree-star-and-orange-and-pink-curly-hair-gallery.png

replies.body:
The MF skin feels really out of place.
I have nothing against fan-service but it never had place in the SG Universe imo.

It just seems like skin for the sake of skin, instead of skin for the sake of design.

I agree with you.... MF easily sells skins.... There are people who tell in the forums " i bought all SG skins last year and I will buy all of them now too!" and this is pathetic and disgusting. Riot only thinks about rich people. But whas about the poor ones who only rarely can afford a skin? I won't buy that one which I don't like just because this is new and there is no better.... I already have the Waterloo skin for MF and I appreciate it because it was a gift from my dear friend. So I don't desire for another MF skin. But if I would, I definitely would not choose SG.
How dare you compare MF to J*. J* is trashy shit. MF is glorious.
It was no offense. I like Jeffree Star and his music.
I think the first reference seems pretty spot on though.

Lol I'm mostly joking. Sorry.

Personally not a fan of him though, he treats people like dirt. I've heard so many stories from fans who have met him and were treated like absolute crap among other things.
Wow I didn't know that :O I thought he was just playing when he acts meany in his videos. I will seach for these stories.

Wait a minute, does that mean that she isn't wearing any panties when using her guns!?!?!

Must do some research on this topic....

That being said, I don't think this is the case, otherwise she would probably have a halo and wings and maybe pole dance as her B animation.

I don't think Riot dares to make this move. They are fearing any copyright. But I'm not surprised after this: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YxjeZLEPGw4
Smite had to delete a skin because it was similiar to a Mortal Kombat character. The comparison is at 0:40
